School conjuration (calling) [see text for lesser planar binding]; Level occultist 6, psychic 6, sorcerer/wizard 6, summoner 5, unchained Summoner 6; Domain Void 6; Subdomain Aeon 6, Daemon 6, Demon 6, Devil 6, Inevitable 6, Protean 6; Bloodline Efreeti 6, Infernal 6;

Casting Time 10 minutes
Components V, S

Range close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
Targets up to three elementals or outsiders, totaling no more than 12 HD, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart when they appear
Duration instantaneous
Saving Throw Will negates;  Spell Resistance no

Description

This spell functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.y4b1zmhmsa0gvf06]{Lesser Planar Binding}, except that you may call a single creature of 12 HD or less, or up to three creatures of the same kind whose Hit Dice total no more than 12. Each creature gets a saving throw, makes an independent attempt to escape, and must be individually persuaded to aid you.
